attributes.action: Re-evaluate the level of the Inheritance Tax threshold
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In this time of increased home ownership and the ever increasing cost of housing, we, the undersigned, request that the IHT be re-evaluated and increased to £500,000 with annual reviews to take place which would take into account property value increases/decreases year on year and inflation.
